summary: Order management dashboard for jewelry manufacturing with tabs for Total Orders, Ready Orders, Karigar Orders, and Customer Orders. Includes order filtering, status updates, and real-time metrics.
architectural_notes: Dashboard has multiple tabs: Total Orders, Ready Orders, Karigar Orders, Customer Orders
Orders have status field (pending/ready) that determines tab placement
Tab-specific metrics displayed in dashboard header icons
Order type filtering implemented for Customer Orders tab (CO only)

existing_features.title: Modify Total Orders tab to display only orders with status 'Pending'. When rows are selected and marked as ready, remove them from the Total Orders view immediately.
In Karigars tab, when viewing a specific karigar's pending orders and marking them as ready, remove those orders from the karigar's pending order list immediately.

Update SummaryCards component to calculate and display metrics (Total Orders count, Total Weight, Total Quantity, Customer Orders count) based on the currently active tab's filtered data, not all orders.
Modify Customer Orders tab to filter and display only orders where order type is 'CO', excluding all other order types.
Reorder all table columns across all dashboard tabs to display data in this exact sequence: Generic name, Karigar name, wt, size, qty, design code, remarks, order number, type, product.

new_feature_requests.summary: Total Orders tab shows pending orders; selecting and marking as ready removes from Total and moves to Ready tab
Karigar tab: selecting pending orders and marking as ready removes from Karigar pending list and moves to Ready tab
Dashboard icons (Total orders, weight, qty, customer orders) reflect values for currently selected tab and update dynamically on tab change
Customer Orders tab filters to show only order type 'CO'
Display dashboard data in all tabs with sequence: Generic name, Karigar name, wt, size, qty, design code, remarks, order number, type, product

projectName: Fix order status filtering, tab-specific metrics, and column ordering
